title: bAgu mIraganu
sahitya:
bAgu mIraganu nAtO palukaga rAdA vAdA


anupallavi

  nAgarAja giri nivAsA naLinAkSa vEnkatEshA


caraNam 1    bhava pOSaNamunakai dhanikula palumAru vinuti jEyu kavijanamula sAvAsamu kArAdni rOsi
navarasambu lOlugagani nAma kIrtanamulu vivaramu kApATi nA vesatalanu dIrccenani
    caraNam 2    sharaNAgata vatsala nI craNa yugammula nA hrt-sarasuruhamuna nilpi jUci virula tOnu 
niratamu pUjincu vELa niNTAra bhAdinceTi durita shESa rOgamulanu dunimi ikanu brOcEnani
    caraNam 3    nI lAvaNyamu jUDanu nEnentO vEDaga nIvIlAganaya cuTadi nIku mEra 
shrI lOlA javamuna gOpAla dAsuni karammiTi vAlAyamu gAcina daivamu nEnani I vELanu
